name: Scarab Tales
description: Scarab Tales is a casual puzzle game in Egyptian theme. Lead scarabaeus bugs to safety by clicking on them and various level elements. Solve 100 original challenging levels, gain achievements and compete with other players in crossplatform score chart and global leaderboards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of VRAM. Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1GB of VRAM. Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Not a bad little casual puzzle game in a bundle
Yes i like it,nice music,nice puzzles,good price on sales.
